data.text: @mcgheeianmcghee @McGR3G0R_ But we've seen that it is nothing like 1918 @mcgheeianmcghee is correct. It is being used by the CCP to degrade our economies. Trump challenged the CCP with his Trade War and they didn't like it. He was right to do what he did. Their real intent has been revealed. We are at war.
@mcgheeianmcghee @McGR3G0R_ Get a fucking grip sorry you can't ya brainwashed
@McGR3G0R_ Chinese bioweapon supported by Chinese Psyops aimed at conspiracy theorists!

@McGR3G0R_ @Hidinginplains8 @mcgheeianmcghee https://t.co/zv8vJHI4aH

PCR is unreliable.  I'd question every result if Cycle threshold is high. Also ask yourself exactly what is being looked for. Sequence of SARS CoV-2 similar to other coronaviruses and it has definitely not been isolated. Read the  article, it may help you

@McGR3G0R_ @Hidinginplains8 @mcgheeianmcghee I blame the PCR for amplified numbers. Evidence is plentiful to show that the diagnostic process for ASYMPTO cases is WRONG. Could be loads of folk out there who think they had CV19 and who may very well not have. I woukd like to see confirmatory seroprevalence studies done

@McGR3G0R_ @Hidinginplains8 @mcgheeianmcghee I agree its wrong. I appreciate that there  can be post viral effects but in this  instance your friend was asympto? The link to me at least seems a little tenuous.
@McGR3G0R_ @Mary04683675 @Hidinginplains8 One of the effects of Corona is a thickening of the blood. Add the lack of Oxygen and a heart attack is not unusual! https://t.co/qp56CKHey6

@McGR3G0R_ @Hidinginplains8 @mcgheeianmcghee Heart Failure is not usually recorded as a cause of death because ultimately all deaths are caused by the heart stopping. I would ask the coroner why this has happened and what the link to Covid was.
@McGR3G0R_ @Hidinginplains8 @mcgheeianmcghee Sorry for your loss.  Assume your friend had a +pcr test. Are you doubting the diagnosis?

@McGR3G0R_ So you'd rather take the risk that un restricted it would kill more people! 10 million Asthma, Diabetes and Co morbid's, mostly of working age? Or let it mutate and kill younger people like 1918? Even Sweden admits it got it wrong!
@McGR3G0R_ Sorry to hear that. I don't have access to the medical notes! But long Covid is documented to cause damage!
